name: Complete website with HTML, CSS & JavaScript
detail: I can leverage the Figma design supplied by the client to transform it into completely responsive, user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

name: Single Page Appication with ReactJS / NextJS
detail: I can build and design single-page React/NextJS websites that are completely responsive, authenticated, have dynamic routes, and use both server and client based data fetching techniques.

name: MERN stack web application
detail: Utilizing ExpressJS, NextJS, Typescript, SQL or NoSQL database, I can build a full-stack website that includes all CRUD operations as well as complete authentication and authorization capabilities like JWT, role based routing, and payment gateway systems.
